Name: Neuro Horror
About the game: Psychological horror in format of a visual novel, created using a neural network. The game is a text horror quest in which player is shown a story, by displaying text on the screen, accompanied by images, musical and sound environments. The player can influence course of the game's history by answering simple questions. Meet the main characters of the story: King - A brave and courageous hero who declared war on the Big Eye. A guy named Bumble - One of the king's friends, an explorer of other worlds. Mack - Lover of astral adventures. Almost died as a result of a psychological experiment with coins. As they adventure, they encounter life, death, and borderline states.
